changelogs.description: Joomla content plugin. Syntax highlightning of code snippets. Uses JS library Prismjs (prism.com). Uses PHP library laminas/laminas-dom.
changelogs.maintainer: G@HService Berlin NeukÃ¶lln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer (ghsvs.de)

fix.item: Temporary bug fix: When plugin method runs twice => "irritation". E.g. when a module fires content.prepare.

requirement.entry: maximumJoomla: 3.10.x But removed J4 blockage for testing purposes.

change.item: - See https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_content_prismhighlighterghsvs/compare/2021.07.07...2021.07.18 - See there $this->count which is the temporary bug fix.
